fields.text: Thank you for calling Redfin San Francisco, where local experts help you find, tour, and make offers on your dream home.
To search home listings or schedule a tour with a local agent, press '[INDEX]'.
To search homes by neighborhood, price, or features, press '[INDEX]'.
One moment, please, while we connect you to our listings search service.
To schedule a home tour with a Redfin agent, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we arrange your home tour with a local agent.
For direct assistance or to make an offer on a property, press '[INDEX]'.
To speak with a Redfin real estate agent, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you with an available Redfin agent.
To learn about making an offer and next steps, press '[INDEX]'.
One moment, please, while we connect you to our offers team.
